data.text: A task is something that must be accomplished without fail.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>A task is something that must be accomplished without fail.

data.text:
If one receives a task, they must see it through 
to the end, finishing it themselves.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>If one receives a task, they must see it through 
<story>to the end, finishing it themselves.

data.text: That is what it means to be responsible.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>That is what it means to be responsible.

data.text: Kyaa!!
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed: <story>Kyaa!!

data.text: A scream…? Wait, that was from the Ritto Dormitory…!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>A scream…? Wait, that was from the Ritto Dormitory…!

data.text:
W-Wait, Rice-san. Remember, if something dangerous is happening 
we are supposed to stay inside and call the Dorm Master…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>W-Wait, Rice-san. Remember, if something dangerous is happening 
<story>we are supposed to stay inside and call the Dorm Master…

data.text: Everyone, it is dangerous out here!
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Everyone, it is dangerous out here!

data.text: Th-That's Bourbon-san's voice…!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Th-That's Bourbon-san's voice…!

data.text: Rice-san!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Rice-san!?

data.text: Hagaaa… Hawawa… Ababababa…
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed: <story>Hagaaa… Hawawa… Ababababa…

data.text: What the hell happened to you!? You're lookin' real pale!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>What the hell happened to you!? You're lookin' real pale!

data.text: J… Ju… Just now… A hand… A zombie's hand…!
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed: <story>J… Ju… Just now… A hand… A zombie's hand…!

data.text:
Tsk… I must tell the others to not come out 
right now. What we are dealing with is…
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Tsk… I must tell the others to not come out 
<story>right now. What we are dealing with is…

data.text:
Ah. Bourbon-san, I'm from the decoration committee. How's the 
progress going with the zombie hand toy that I requested?
data.name: Horsegirl B
data.processed:
<story>Ah. Bourbon-san, I'm from the decoration committee. How's the 
<story>progress going with the zombie hand toy that I requested?

data.text:
My apologies! The head of the dormitory and the academy have both 
approved the purchase. All that is left is for me to complete 
the purchase, so… Hmm…? Huh…???
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>My apologies! The head of the dormitory and the academy have both 
<story>approved the purchase. All that is left is for me to complete 
<story>the purchase, so… Hmm…? Huh…???

data.text: Eh!? It was justa toy!! And yer phone ended up breakin' too!?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Eh!? It was justa toy!! And yer phone ended up breakin' too!?

data.text:
That is correct. An error in the ordering process resulted in 50 
“extremely fast zombie hands” being delivered to the 
dormitories. While returning them a malfunction occurred, and 
now we are in this predicament.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>That is correct. An error in the ordering process resulted in 50 
<story>“extremely fast zombie hands” being delivered to the 
<story>dormitories. While returning them a malfunction occurred, and 
<story>now we are in this predicament.

data.text:
50!? Jeez! First the smoke machine and now this, 
yer real bad with machines, ain't ya…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>50!? Jeez! First the smoke machine and now this, 
<story>yer real bad with machines, ain't ya…

data.text:
However, this is my task to complete. 
Therefore I must fix it myself…
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>However, this is my task to complete. 
<story>Therefore I must fix it myself…

data.text:
No, don't worry bout it. Creek n' I'll take 
care of it… Bourbon, you wait here.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>No, don't worry bout it. Creek n' I'll take 
<story>care of it… Bourbon, you wait here.

data.text: Eh…?
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Eh…?

data.text:
Haa… She really should try askin' for help with things like this. 
Anyways, Creek, see any zombie toys over there?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Haa… She really should try askin' for help with things like this. 
<story>Anyways, Creek, see any zombie toys over there?

data.text: Hey, Tama-chan… Is this really okay? Not having Bourbon help us…
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed: <story>Hey, Tama-chan… Is this really okay? Not having Bourbon help us…

data.text:
Hmm? Well if Bourbon were to help us, she'd just end up 
breakin' the machines again, doncha think? What's the 
point of makin' her do somethin' she can't do?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Hmm? Well if Bourbon were to help us, she'd just end up 
<story>breakin' the machines again, doncha think? What's the 
<story>point of makin' her do somethin' she can't do?

data.text:
It'd be like makin' a child who hasn't learned math yet keep 
track of their family's finances. No one'd do somethin' so cruel. 
Sometimes you just need the right people for the job, doncha think?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>It'd be like makin' a child who hasn't learned math yet keep 
<story>track of their family's finances. No one'd do somethin' so cruel. 
<story>Sometimes you just need the right people for the job, doncha think?

data.text:
(…But the expression Bourbon-chan 
had when you told her to stay…)
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
<story>(…But the expression Bourbon-chan 
<story>had when you told her to stay…)

data.text: Haa… Haa… Bourboon!! We found all the zombie toys!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Haa… Haa… Bourboon!! We found all the zombie toys!

data.text:
I apologize… It was my task to 
fulfill, yet I had to rely on my Senpais to…
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I apologize… It was my task to 
<story>fulfill, yet I had to rely on my Senpais to…

data.text:
No need to worry bout somethin' like this. 
You can always rely on us…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>No need to worry bout somethin' like this. 
<story>You can always rely on us…

data.text:
I refuse. There will be no need for your assistance in the 
future because I will not fail again.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I refuse. There will be no need for your assistance in the 
<story>future because I will not fail again.

data.text:
I truly apologize for what transpired… 
I will conduct the rest of my tasks alone.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I truly apologize for what transpired… 
<story>I will conduct the rest of my tasks alone.

data.text: Eh? W-Wait up, Bourbon!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Eh? W-Wait up, Bourbon!

data.text:
Yer not supposed to say “sorry” in times like these, all we 
wanted was a “thanks…” Aaahhh!! Waait uup!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Yer not supposed to say “sorry” in times like these, all we 
<story>wanted was a “thanks…” Aaahhh!! Waait uup!

data.text: Tama-chan…
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed: <story>Tama-chan…

data.text: Bourbon isn't the only one who needs a bit of help…
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed: <story>Bourbon isn't the only one who needs a bit of help…

data.text:
Rice-san…! I-Is everything okay? 
That scream… and Bourbon-san…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Rice-san…! I-Is everything okay? 
<story>That scream… and Bourbon-san…

data.text: Ahh… U-Umm… Things are probably going to be okay.
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Ahh… U-Umm… Things are probably going to be okay.

data.text: Probably…?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Probably…?

data.text:
I'm sorry for running out there so suddenly… 
I must've startled you right before you went to bed…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>I'm sorry for running out there so suddenly… 
<story>I must've startled you right before you went to bed…

data.text: I'm… really sorry… Good night…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>I'm… really sorry… Good night…

data.text: (Click…)
data.processed: <story>(Click…)
